publicationstmt.publisher: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-03 13:18:00 -0400.

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: This collection contains the late 19th century financial records of building contractors in Killingly, Connecticut.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: G.F. and A.E. Gay were building contractors in Killingly, Connecticut.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains G.F. and A.E. Gay's account book.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, G.F. and A.E. Gay Papers, 1883-1896. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Gay Papers).

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The provenance of this collection is unknown.
